assignments.title: Math Detective: Addition
assignments.description:
##LEARNING##
Adding numbers means putting them together to find out how many you have in total. For example, if you have 3 apples and your friend gives you 2 more, you now have 5 apples (3 + 2 = 5). Let's practice putting numbers together to make totals up to 10!

##QUIZ##
1. What is 2 + 3?A) 4B) 5*C) 6D) 72. If you have 4 toys and get 1 more, how many do you have?A) 3B) 4C) 5*D) 63. What is 5 + 5?A) 8B) 9C) 10*D) 114. What is 7 + 2?A) 8B) 9*C) 10D) 75. If you see 1 bird and then 6 more birds fly by, how many birds did you see in total?A) 5B) 6C) 7*D) 86. What is 3 + 4?A) 6B) 7*C) 8D) 97. What is 8 + 1?A) 7B) 8C) 9*D) 10
